dublin_core.dcvalue: Panel Telling Stories with Data Visualizations Data visualization enhances data increasing data demand and use But understanding how to dig through the data and understand how to increase its utility for monitoring and evaluation and program implementation is a challenge faced by many in digital health This session will highlight how different programs are using data visualization to enhance data and inform decision making Presented by Mandy Dube Assistant Director BID Initiative PATH Zambia
Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-22T11:11:28Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 pixar-twist-on-data-worksheet-1-1-1-1.ppt: 457216 bytes, checksum: 0f25058b3eaff1b5092828d791a28c94 (MD5)
